title: Forecast Janna needs a rework
body:
This skin was one of my least favorite skins of Janna from the start, but definitely one of the least apealing legendary skins and with the coming of star guardian Janna it's now become even more obsolete. I would like to see some real rework done on Janna.

What do you guys think?

replies.body: It is my favorite legendary skin and I use it all the time even though it is a little bit pay to lose. I think it is spunky. The cloud is cute and the emotes are fun. Singing in the rain is also a favorite of mine.
